DOC.brief_summary: The purpose Optimize RV Follow-Up study determine long-term effect selective site pacing . Selective site pace refers area right ventricle lead place . The goal selective site pace improve heart contract pace .
DOC.brief_title: Optimize RV Follow-up Selective Site Pacing Clinical Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The Optimize RV Follow-Up Selective Site Pacing Clinical Trial open subject previously enrol Optimize RV Selective Site Pacing Clinical Trial .
DOC.criteria: Subjects enrol Optimize RV study ( version 3 , date 6 March 2007 ) Subjects legal guardian willing able sign Informed Consent ( Authorization use Disclose Health Information Form , applicable ) Subjects device program outside Optimize RV programming requirement Subjects implanted implantable cardioverterdefibrillator ( ICD ) cardiac resynchronization therapy ( CRT ) device Subjects pregnant nursing
